pullRequest.title: Added Basalt + Blackstone to Crucible
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
Added Blackstone and Basalt -> Lava Bucket to crucibles. Duplicate of #2398 I had closed as others had claimed the issue; as discussed in Slimefun's Discord a few days ago, due to inactivity I updated my fork and PR'ed once again.
Changes
Added Blackstone -> Lava and Basalt -> Lava to Crucible and Electrified Crucible. Following @LinoxGH's suggestion in #2398 I made the recipe cost half as many blocks per Lava Bucket due to materials being Nether related.
Related Issues
Resolves #2369
Checklist

 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
Not applicable:
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I have added Nonnull and Nullable annotations to my methods to indicate their behaviour for null values
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

commit.message: Added blackstone and basalt -> lava to crucibles

nodes.bodyText: M i s o r g a n i z a t i o n .
